SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_enabled=Enabled SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_enabled.hint=Enable or disable the Syntax Highlighting feature on the entire wiki. SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_theme=Theme SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_theme.hint=The theme to style the editor with. SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_highlightColor=Highlight Color SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_highlightColor.hint=The color to use when highlighting the curretly selected word or piece of text. Any CSS color format is accepted. SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_lineWrapping=Line Wrapping SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass_lineWrapping.hint=Enable to wrap long lines of text that do not fit in the editor's window or disable to view them by scrolling horizontally.
